args: Does this describe a specific, new, official action or formal announcement already taken/made by the Trump administration? Answer only "yes" or "no". President Donald Trump on Monday touted his weekend threat to levy tariffs on Colombia after they... President Donald Trump on Monday touted his weekend threat to levy tariffs on Colombia after they turned away deportation flights — and said his actions should send a message to other nations. “As you saw yesterday, we’ve made it clear to every country that they will be taking back our people … and they’re going to take them back fast,” Trump said at the House Republicans’ Florida retreat. “And if they don’t, they’ll pay a very high economic price. And we’re going to immediately install massive tariffs.” Trump also reiterated his love of the word “tariff” — which he joked was his fourth favorite word in the dictionary, after “God,” “love” and “religion.”
